4829 /**
4830  * Renders SequenceNavigator
4831  * @class
4832  * @private
4833  */
4834 tau.ui.SequenceNavigator.prototype.renderer = tau.mixin({
4835 
4836   // Navigation Animations
4837   ANIM: new tau.fx.Transition({
4838     timingFunction: 'ease-in-out', 
4839     duration: tau.rt.hasTouch ? '0.25s' : '0.5s'}),
4840   ANIM_IN_FADE: new tau.fx.Transition({
4841     timingFunction: 'ease', 
4842     duration: tau.rt.hasTouch ? '0.25s' : '0.5s'}),
4843   ANIM_OUT_FADE: new tau.fx.Transition({
4844     timingFunction: 'ease', 
4845     duration: tau.rt.hasTouch ? '0.25s' : '0.5s'}),
4846 
4847   /**
4848    * root DOM element에 설정되는 기본 style Class
4849    */
4850   $base: 'tau-sequencenavigator',
4851 
4852   /**
4853    * style Class 
4854    * <p />
4855    * template에서 사용하는 style Class를 정의한다.
4856    */
4857   $styleClass: {
4858     navigationContainer: 'tau-navbar',
4859     toolbarContainer: 'toolBar', // TODO: 삭제될 예정
4860     content: '-content',
4861     hasnavigationbar: 'tau-navbar-padding'
4862   },
4863 
4864   /** 
4865    * html template
4866    * style class는 <code>${key}</code>로 묶어서 표시한다.
4867    * {@link $base}, {@link $styleClass}에 설정되어 있는 style class가 <code>${key}</code>를 대체한다.
4868    */
4869   _template: ['<div class="${base} ${hasnavigationbar}">',
4870                 '<div class=${navigationContainer}></div>',
4871                 '<div class=${toolbarContainer}></div>',
4872                 '<div class=${base}${content}></div>',
4873               '</div>'],
4874 
4875   /**
4876    * $dom 구조를 설정한다.
4877    * <p/> 
4878    * 최상위 {@link tau.ui.ROOT_KEY}를 제외한 나머지에 대해서 설정하면 된다.
4879    * @param {Object} $dom key에 해당하는 DOM Element를 가지는 객체
4880    * @param {String} $base base style class
4881    * @param {HTMLElement} root root가 되는 DOM Element
4882    * @see tau.ui.BaseRenderer._initializeDOM
4883    */
4884   _initializeDOM: function ($dom, $base, root) {
4885     $dom[tau.ui.SequenceNavigator.NAVBAR_KEY] = root.childNodes[0];
4886     $dom[tau.ui.NavigationController.TOOLBAR_KEY] = root.childNodes[1];
4887     $dom[tau.ui.CONTENT_KEY] = root.childNodes[2];
4888   },
4889               
4890   /**
4891    * $dom의 key가 추가될 parent DOM element를 반환한다.
4892    * @param {Object} $renderData base style class와 $dom 구조를 가지는 객체
4893    * @param {String} key $dom 키값
4894    * @param {Boolean} [createElement=true] 
4895    * @returns {HTMLElement}
4896    * @see tau.ui.BaseRenderer.getParentElement
4897    */
4898   getParentElement: function ($renderData, key, createElement) {
4899     var $dom = $renderData.$dom;
4900     switch (key) {
4901     case tau.ui.CONTENT_KEY:
4902       return $dom[key];
4903     default:
4904       return tau.ui.BaseRenderer.getParentElement.apply(this, arguments);
4905     }
4906   },
4907   
4908   /**
4909    * push을 위한 render.
4910    * @param {Object} $renderData base style class와 $dom 구조를 가지는 객체 DOM structure
4911    * @param {Object} pushed 들어오는 Controller 컨텐트
4912    * @param {Object} active 나가는 Controller 컨텐트
4913    * @param {function} callbackFn Draw가 완료된 후 호출되는 콜백함수
4914    */
4915   renderPush: function ($renderData, pushed, active, callbackFn) {
4916     var $dom = $renderData.$dom,
4917         pushedCtrlDOM = pushed.ctrl.getDOM(),
4918         pushedNavDOM = pushed.nav.getDOM(),
4919         pushedCtrlDOMWidth = pushedCtrlDOM.offsetWidth;
4920     
4921     // Option to disable navigation bar
4922     if (pushed.opts.hideNavigationBar) {
4923       $dom[tau.ui.SequenceNavigator.NAVBAR_KEY].style.display = 'none';
4924       tau.util.dom.removeClass($dom[tau.ui.ROOT_KEY], this.$styleClass.hasnavigationbar);
4925     } else if (active && !active.opts.hideNavigationBar) {
4926       $dom[tau.ui.SequenceNavigator.NAVBAR_KEY].style.display = '';
4927       tau.util.dom.addClass($dom[tau.ui.ROOT_KEY], this.$styleClass.hasnavigationbar);
4928     }
4929 
4930     if (pushed.nav) {
4931       //pushedNavDOM.style.display = 'none'; // title max-width를 설정하기 위해 'none'으로 처리하면 안됨.
4932       pushedNavDOM.style.opacity = 0;
4933       pushed.nav.draw($dom[tau.ui.SequenceNavigator.NAVBAR_KEY]);
4934     }
4935     if (pushed.opts && pushed.opts.animation) {      
4936       pushedCtrlDOM.style.display = 'none';
4937       pushedCtrlDOM.style.left = pushedCtrlDOMWidth + 'px'; // Align to the right of active
4938       pushedCtrlDOM.style.visibility = 'visible';
4939       pushedCtrlDOM.style.display = null;
4940       
4941       // Animate the parent content element
4942       this.ANIM.setStyle('-webkit-transform', 'translateX(-' + pushedCtrlDOMWidth + 'px)', { 
4943         onEnd: function (e) {
4944           active.ctrl.getDOM().style.display  = 'none';
4945           e.target.style.webkitTransform = null;
4946           pushedCtrlDOM.style.left  = null;
4947           callbackFn();
4948       }
4949       });
4950 
4951       // Animate incoming/outgoing navigation bars
4952       this.ANIM_IN_FADE.setStyle('opacity', '1');
4953       this.ANIM_IN_FADE.setStyle('-webkit-transform', 'translateX(0)', {
4954         onEnd: function (e) {
4955           e.target.style.zIndex = null;
4956         }
4957       });
4958 
4959       this.ANIM_OUT_FADE.setStyle('opacity', '0');
4960       this.ANIM_OUT_FADE.setStyle('-webkit-transform', 'translateX(-' + pushedCtrlDOMWidth/2 + 'px)', { 
4961         onEnd: function (e) {
4962           e.target.style.display  = 'none';
4963         }
4964       });
4965       
4966       pushed.nav.setStyles({
4967         opacity: 0, // prevents nav bar flicker
4968         zIndex: 1,
4969         webkitTransform: 'translateX(' +  pushedCtrlDOMWidth/2 + 'px)',
4970       });
4971       pushed.nav.setVisible(true);      
4972       
4973       
4974       var self = this;
4975       
4976       window.setTimeout(function(){        
4977         self.ANIM.animate($dom[tau.ui.CONTENT_KEY], {delay:-1});
4978         self.ANIM_IN_FADE.animate(pushedNavDOM, {delay:-1});
4979         self.ANIM_OUT_FADE.animate(active.nav.getDOM(), {delay:-1});
4980       }, 0);      
4981     } else {
4982       if (pushed.nav) {
4983         
4984         pushed.nav.setStyles({
4985           opacity: 1,
4986         });
4987         pushed.nav.setVisible(true);      
4988       }
4989       // Coordinate to same positions even after non-animated push
4990       if (active && active.ctrl) {
4991         active.nav.getDOM().style.display = 'none';
4992       }
4993       callbackFn();
4994     }
4995   },
4996 
4997   /**
4998    * pop을 위한 render.
4999    * @param {Object} $renderData base style class와 $dom 구조를 가지는 객체 DOM structure
5000    * @param {Object} popped 나가는 Controller 컨텐트
5001    * @param {Object} active 들어오는 Controller 컨텐트
5002    * @param {function} callbackFn Draw가 완료된 후 호출되는 콜백함수
5003    */
5004   renderPop: function ($renderData, popped, active, callbackFn) {
5005     var $dom = $renderData.$dom,
5006         activeCtrlDOM, activeCtrlDOMWidth;
5007     
5008     // Align incoming/outgoing contents next to each other
5009     if (active && active.ctrl) {
5010       activeCtrlDOM = active.ctrl.getDOM();
5011       activeCtrlDOM.style.left  = '-100%';
5012     }
5013 
5014     // Option to disable navigation bar
5015     if (active.opts.hideNavigationBar) {
5016       $dom[tau.ui.SequenceNavigator.NAVBAR_KEY].style.display = 'none';
5017       tau.util.dom.removeClass($dom[tau.ui.ROOT_KEY], this.$styleClass.hasnavigationbar);
5018     } else if (popped && popped.opts.hideNavigationBar) {
5019       $dom[tau.ui.SequenceNavigator.NAVBAR_KEY].style.display = '';
5020       tau.util.dom.addClass($dom[tau.ui.ROOT_KEY], this.$styleClass.hasnavigationbar);
5021     }
5022 
5023     /** @inner Clears navigation bar position and executes callback */
5024     function doCallback() {
5025       if (active.nav) { // Properly displays non-animated/hideNavigationBar pops 
5026         active.nav.setStyles({
5027           opacity: null,
5028           left: null
5029         });
5030         active.nav.setVisible(true);
5031       }
5032       callbackFn();
5033     }
5034 
5035     if (active.nav) {
5036       active.nav.setStyles({
5037         opacity: 0
5038       });
5039 //      active.nav.setVisible(true);
5040       active.nav.draw($dom[tau.ui.SequenceNavigator.NAVBAR_KEY]);
5041     }
5042     if (active.tool) {
5043       active.tool.draw($dom[tau.ui.NavigationController.TOOLBAR_KEY]);
5044       active.tool.getDOM().style.display = '';
5045     }
5046 
5047     if (popped.opts && popped.opts.animation) {
5048 
5049       // Animate the parent content element
5050       activeCtrlDOM.style.display  = '';
5051       activeCtrlDOMWidth = activeCtrlDOM.offsetWidth;
5052       this.ANIM.setStyle('-webkit-transform', 'translateX(' + activeCtrlDOMWidth + 'px)', { 
5053         onEnd: function (e) {
5054           activeCtrlDOM.style.left  = null;
5055           e.target.style.webkitTransform = null;
5056           popped.ctrl.getDOM().style.display = 'none';
5057           callbackFn();
5058         }
5059       });
5060 
5061       // Animate incoming/outgoing navigation bars
5062       if (popped && popped.nav) {
5063         
5064         this.ANIM_OUT_FADE.setStyle('opacity', '0');
5065         this.ANIM_OUT_FADE.setStyle('-webkit-transform', 'translateX(' + activeCtrlDOMWidth / 2 + 'px)', { 
5066           onEnd: function (e) {
5067             e.target.style.display  = 'none';
5068             e.target.style.webkitTransform = null;
5069           }
5070         });
5071         this.ANIM_OUT_FADE.animate(popped.nav.getDOM()); 
5072       }
5073       
5074       this.ANIM_IN_FADE.setStyle('opacity', '1');
5075       this.ANIM_IN_FADE.setStyle('-webkit-transform', 'translateX(0)', {
5076         onEnd: function (e) {
5077           e.target.style.zIndex  = null;
5078         }
5079       });
5080       
5081       active.nav.setStyles({
5082         webkitTransform: 'translateX(-' + activeCtrlDOMWidth / 2  +'px)',
5083         zIndex: 1
5084       });
5085       
5086       active.nav.setVisible(true);
5087       
5088       var self = this;
5089       window.setTimeout(function(){       
5090         self.ANIM.animate($dom[tau.ui.CONTENT_KEY], {delay:-1});
5091         self.ANIM_IN_FADE.animate(active.nav.getDOM(), {delay:-1});
5092       }, 0);
5093       
5094     } else {
5095       // Coordinate to same positions even after non-animated pop
5096       activeCtrlDOM.style.left = '';
5097       active.nav.setVisible(true);
5098       doCallback();
5099     }
5100   }
5101 }, tau.ui.BaseRenderer);
5102 
5103 /**
5104  * Renders ParallelNavigator
5105  * @class
5106  * @private
5107  */
5108 tau.ui.ParallelNavigator.prototype.renderer = tau.mixin({
5109 
5110   /**
5111    * root DOM element에 설정되는 기본 style Class
5112    */
5113   $base: 'tau-tabbarnavigator',
5114 
5115   /**
5116    * style Class 
5117    * <p />
5118    * template에서 사용하는 style Class를 정의한다.
5119    */
5120   $styleClass: {
5121     hastabbar: 'tau-hastabbar',
5122     tabbar: 'tau-tabbar',
5123     content: '-content'
5124   },  
5125 
5126   /** 
5127    * html template
5128    * style class는 <code>${key}</code>로 묶어서 표시한다.
5129    * {@link $base}, {@link $styleClass}에 설정되어 있는 style class가 <code>${key}</code>를 대체한다.
5130    */
5131   _template: ['<div class="tau ${base} ${hastabbar}">',
5132                 '<div class=${tabbar}></div>',
5133                 '<div class=toolBar></div>',
5134                 '<div class=${base}${content}></div>',
5135               '</div>'],
5136   
5137   /**
5138    * $dom 구조를 설정한다.
5139    * <p/> 
5140    * 최상위 {@link tau.ui.ROOT_KEY}를 제외한 나머지에 대해서 설정하면 된다.
5141    * @param {Object} $dom key에 해당하는 DOM Element를 가지는 객체
5142    * @param {String} $base base style class
5143    * @param {HTMLElement} root root가 되는 DOM Element
5144    * @see tau.ui.BaseRenderer._initializeDOM
5145    */
5146   _initializeDOM: function ($dom, $base, root) {
5147     $dom[tau.ui.ParallelNavigator.TABBAR_KEY] = root.childNodes[0];
5148     $dom[tau.ui.NavigationController.TOOLBAR_KEY] = root.childNodes[1];
5149     $dom[tau.ui.CONTENT_KEY] = root.childNodes[2];
5150   },
5151 
5152   
5153   /**
5154    * $dom의 key가 추가될 parent DOM element를 반환한다.
5155    * @param {Object} $renderData base style class와 $dom 구조를 가지는 객체
5156    * @param {String} key $dom 키값 
5157    * @param {Boolean} [createElement=true]
5158    * @returns {HTMLElement}
5159    * @see tau.ui.BaseRenderer.getParentElement
5160    */
5161   getParentElement: function ($renderData, key, createElement) {
5162     var $dom = $renderData.$dom;
5163     switch (key) {
5164     case tau.ui.ParallelNavigator.TABBAR_KEY:
5165       return $dom[key];
5166     default:
5167       return tau.ui.BaseRenderer.getParentElement.apply(this, arguments);
5168     }
5169   },
5170   
5171   /**
5172    * tabbar를 보여준다.
5173    * @param {Object} $renderData base style class와 $dom 구조를 가지는 객체
5174    */
5175   showTabbar: function ($renderData) {
5176     var $dom = $renderData.$dom;
5177     $dom[tau.ui.ParallelNavigator.TABBAR_KEY].style.display = '';
5178     tau.util.dom.addClass($dom[tau.ui.ROOT_KEY], this.$styleClass.hastabbar);
5179   },
5180 
5181   /**
5182    * tabbar를 보이지 않게 한다.
5183    * @param {Object} $renderData base style class와 $dom 구조를 가지는 객체
5184    */
5185   hideTabbar: function ($renderData) {
5186     var $dom = $renderData.$dom;
5187     $dom[tau.ui.ParallelNavigator.TABBAR_KEY].style.display = 'none';
5188     tau.util.dom.removeClass($dom[tau.ui.ROOT_KEY], this.$styleClass.hastabbar);
5189   }
5190 
5191 }, tau.ui.BaseRenderer);
5192 
5193 /**
5194  * Renders SplitViewController
5195  * @class
5196  * @private
5197  */
5198 tau.ui.SplitViewController.prototype.renderer = tau.mixin({
5199   $base: 'tau-splitView',
5200   $styleClass: {
5201     splitviewContainer: 'tau-spContainer',
5202     leftContainer: 'tau-spLeftContainer',
5203     leftNaviBar: 'tau-spLeftNaviBar',
5204     separateBar: 'tau-separateBar',
5205     rightContainer: 'tau-spRightContainer',
5206     rightNaviBar: 'tau-spRightNaviBar',
5207     popOver : 'tau-popOverContainer'
5208   },
5209 
5210   _template:['<div class="${base} ${splitviewContainer}">',
5211              '<div class=${leftContainer}>',
5212              '<div class=${leftNaviBar}></div>',
5213              '</div>',
5214              '<div class=${separateBar}></div>',
5215              '<div class=${rightContainer}>',
5216              '<div class=${rightNaviBar}></div>',
5217              '</div>',             
5218              '</div>'],
5219              
5220   _initializeDOM: function ($dom, $base, root) {
5221     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.LEFT_KEY] = root.childNodes[0];
5222     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.LEFT_NAVIBAR_KEY] = root.childNodes[0].childNodes[0];
5223     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.SEPARATEBAR_KEY] = root.childNodes[1];    
5224     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.RIGHT_KEY] = root.childNodes[2];
5225     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.RIGHT_NAVIBAR_KEY] = root.childNodes[2].childNodes[0];
5226   },
5227   
5228   getParentElement: function ($renderData, key, createElement) {
5229     var $dom = $renderData.$dom;
5230     switch (key) {
5231     case tau.ui.SplitViewController.LEFT_KEY:
5232       return $dom[key];
5233     case tau.ui.SplitViewController.SEPARATEBAR_KEY:
5234       return $dom[key];
5235     case tau.ui.SplitViewController.RIGHT_KEY:
5236       return $dom[key];
5237     case tau.ui.SplitViewController.LEFT_NAVIBAR_KEY:
5238       return $dom[key];
5239     case tau.ui.SplitViewController.RIGHT_NAVIBAR_KEY:
5240       return $dom[key];
5241     default:
5242       return tau.ui.BaseRenderer.getParentElement.apply(this, arguments);
5243     }
5244   },
5245   
5246   setLeftCtrlToPopOver: function ($renderData, opts) {
5247     var $dom = $renderData.$dom;
5248     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.LEFT_KEY].style.display = 'none';
5249     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.LEFT_KEY].style.position = 'absolute'; 
5250     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.LEFT_KEY].style.height = opts.popoverHeightSize;
5251     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.SEPARATEBAR_KEY].style.width = '0px';
5252     
5253     tau.util.dom.addClass($dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.LEFT_KEY],
5254         this.$styleClass.popOver); 
5255   },
5256   
5257   setLeftCtrlToLeftContainer : function ($renderData) {
5258     var $dom = $renderData.$dom;
5259     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.LEFT_KEY].style.display = '';
5260     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.LEFT_KEY].style.position = 'relative'; 
5261     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.LEFT_KEY].style.height = '';
5262     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.SEPARATEBAR_KEY].style.width = '2px';
5263     tau.util.dom.removeClass($dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.LEFT_KEY],
5264         this.$styleClass.popOver);
5265   },
5266   
5267   setOption: function ($renderData, opts) {
5268     var $dom = $renderData.$dom;
5269     $dom[tau.ui.SplitViewController.LEFT_KEY].style.width = opts.leftControllerWidth;
5270   }
5271   
5272 }, tau.ui.BaseRenderer);

5274 /**
5275  * Renders PopoverController
5276  * @class
5277  * @private
5278  */
5279 tau.ui.PopoverController.prototype.renderer = tau.mixin({
5280   $base: 'tau-popoverController',
5281   $styleClass: {
5282     masking: '-masking',
5283     content: '-content',
5284     direction: '-direction'
5285   },
5286   _template:['<div class=${base}>',
5287              '<div class=${base}${direction}></div>',
5288              '<div class=${base}${content}></div>',
5289              '<div class=${base}${masking}></div>',
5290              '</div>'],
5291              
5292   _initializeDOM: function ($dom, $base, root) {
5293     $dom[tau.ui.PopoverController.DIRECTION_KEY] = root.childNodes[0];    
5294     $dom[tau.ui.PopoverController.CONTENT_KEY] = root.childNodes[1];
5295     $dom[tau.ui.PopoverController.MASKING_KEY] = root.childNodes[2];
5296   },
5297   
5298   getParentElement: function ($renderData, key, createElement) {
5299     var $dom = $renderData.$dom;
5300     switch (key) {
5301     case tau.ui.PopoverController.CONTENT_KEY:
5302     case tau.ui.PopoverController.MASKING_KEY:
5303     case tau.ui.PopoverController.DIRECTION_KEY:
5304       return $dom[key];
5305     default:
5306       return tau.ui.BaseRenderer.getParentElement.apply(this, arguments);
5307     }
5308   },
5309 }, tau.ui.BaseRenderer);

5311 /**
5312  * @class
5313  * @private
5314  */
5315 tau.ui.Mask.prototype.renderer = tau.mixin({
5316   $base: 'tau-mask',
5317   
5318   $styleClass: {
5319     fullscreen: '-fullscreen',
5320   },
5321   
5322   updateFullscreen: function ($renderData, fullscreen) {
5323     var $dom = $renderData.$dom;
5324     if (fullscreen) {
5325       tau.util.dom.addClass($dom[tau.ui.ROOT_KEY], 
5326           this.$styleClass.fullscreen, $renderData.$base);
5327     } else {
5328       tau.util.dom.removeClass($dom[tau.ui.ROOT_KEY], 
5329           this.$styleClass.fullscreen, $renderData.$base);
5330     }
5331   }
5332 }, tau.ui.BaseRenderer);
